name: Janky Rope
description:
Platformer that uses swing mechanics and a kind of janky rope. 5 levels, short and sweet.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys: movement

Space: jump

Z/L: Shoot the rope

Up/Down or W/S: Change rope length

Art credits: Retro Lines (https://v3x3d.itch.io/retro-lines)

Pixel font: Pixellari by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante (https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font)
